ol.li: Log in to the Horizon web console as an Admin or user with Admin privileges.
Select the Admin project in the Project selector. This installation will fail if a tenant/project other than "Admin" is selected.
Click on the Admin panel in Horizon, select the Development Platform panel, and then click Configure Services.

If you are not already connected to the HP Download Network (HDN), click Connect in the Configure Services panel and enter your username and password. If you don't have a username and pasword yet, click Sign-up and follow the prompts.
In the Configure Services table, locate the Application Lifecycle Service item.
Select Download Service and wait for the download to complete. Do not download multiple services at the same time. This is unsupported and will cause errors.
When the download is complete, click Project > Compute > Images and verify that two images with the prefix "HP Helion Development Platform - Application Lifecycle Service" are now available for use.
